definition: shackle that consists of a metal loop that can be locked around the wrist, confine or restrain with or as if with manacles or handcuffs
details:
noun
- shackle that consists of a metal loop that can be locked around the wrist
= synonyms: cuff
verb
- confine or restrain with or as if with manacles or handcuffs
= example: confine or restrain with or as if with manacles or handcuffs
= synonyms: cuff
